programme.title: Chaos
programme.desc: Two cops partner up in order to uncover how a group of bank robbers managed to escape from a bank during a heist that apparently has other motives than just stealing money.

programme.title: Wonder Woman
programme.desc: Princess Diana, Princess of the Amazon, was trained at Paradise Island to become an invincible warrior. When an American pilot lands on her island and tells her about the war raging in the outside world, she decides to go with him. As she tries to stop ongoing wars while testing her superpowers.

programme.title: Aeon Flux
programme.desc: Set in the year 2415, a deadly pathogenic virus has killed 99% of the Earth's population. Æon Flux is a mysterious assassin and a member of The Monicans, a secret group aiming to overthrow the government. After a mission to destroy a surveillance station, Æon comes home to find her sister Una has been mistaken for a Monican and killed. When Æon is sent on a mission to kill the government's leader, Trevor Goodchild, she discovers that both she and the Monicans are being manipulated by council members in a secret coup.

programme.title: 16 Blocks
programme.desc: Detective Jack Mosley, who is an alcoholic, is assigned a last minute mission after a hard day's work. The mission is to escort a witness 16 blocks from the police station to the courthouse, but he discovers that several people want the witness dead, and Jack is faced with an unlikely situation where he has to choose between his duty and his loyalty to his police officer colleagues.

programme.title: Jumper
programme.desc: David, a teenager with teleportation abilities, finds himself in a local library where he discovers his ability to 'jump' from one place to another. He decides to make use of this newly-acquired ability to leave his abusive father and plan a stable life for himself.

programme.title: Pompeii
programme.desc: In 79 A.D., a slave turned gladiator races against time to save his beloved from marrying a corrupt Roman Senator, as Mount Vesuvius erupts in the Roman city of Pompeii.

programme.title: Ride Along 2
programme.desc: James and Ben team up again for a second Ride Along film.James and Ben team up again for a second Ride Along, and try to bust some drug dealing operations in Miami, before Ben’s wedding to James’ sister.

programme.title: Knight and Day
programme.desc: June Havens meets Secret Agent Miller, at the airport by accident. She gets involved with him in a secret operation to protect an energy source that holds the key to infinite power. Things get more complicated when Miller's enemies tell June that Miller suffers from a nervous breakdown.

programme.title: Mr & Mrs. Smith
programme.desc: A married couple going through marriage counseling discover that they are both assassins working for competing agencies when they are charged with killing each other.

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift
programme.desc: American teenager Sean likes to participate in illegal car races. When he wrecks his rival's car and a race ends in disaster, he's sent to his father in Tokyo to avoid a prison sentence, and there, he discovers the underworld of street racing.

programme.title: Fast & Furious
programme.desc: Ex-con Dom Toretto and FBI agent, Brian O'Connor, must put aside their feuds and team up to take down a heroin importer.

programme.title: Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines
programme.desc: Now in his twenties, John Connor is being hunted by a new female terminator, the T-X. A CSM-101 terminator is sent back in time to protect him just as the machines start to take over the world.

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: A police detective attempts to arrest a seemingly-spoiled, wealthy man for a racist murder, but is facing difficulty doing so. The only witness to the incident refuses to disclose the real events of what has happened.

programme.title: Daredevil
programme.desc: Matt Murdock is a blind lawyer who has a secret identity; as he fights criminals at courtrooms by day, he's the masked vigilante Daredevil by night. He vows to fight crime and faces off against a criminal leader known as the Kingpin.

programme.title: xXx: The Return of Xander Cage
programme.desc: Xander Cage returns after self-imposed exile leaving an impression that he was long dead. He secretly works with his handler, Augustus Gibbons, and his team to recover a sinister and seemingly unstoppable weapon known as Pandora's box.

programme.title: Fast Five
programme.desc: Dominic Toretto and his crew find themselves on the wrong side of the law once again as they plan a heist to buy their freedom while being watched by a ruthless drug lord and a relentless federal agent.

programme.title: Fast & Furious 6
programme.desc: Federal agent Hobbs (Dwayne Johnson) enlists the aid of Dom (Vin Diesel) and his crew to bring a criminal mastermind Shaw (Luke Evans) and his gang to justice. In exchange for full pardons, they must put an end to their schemes, no matter how personal the cost.

programme.title: I, Frankenstein
programme.desc: Frankenstein's monster becomes involved in an ancient war between two immortal clans of demons and gargoyles.

programme.title: Paycheck
programme.desc: Michael is an engineer, who has his memory erased after completing each job. When the wealthy James Rithrick offers him a multiple-year contract, with the same conditions, he realizes that erasing his memory has erased crucial details of the work assignment.

programme.title: Abduction
programme.desc: Upon discovering his baby photo on a website for missing persons, Nathan discovers that the father and mother he has been living with throughout his youth are not his real parents. He sets out to uncover the truth about his life.

programme.title: WarGames
programme.desc: A computer whiz kid accidentally connects into a top secret super-computer that allows him to control the US nuclear arsenal. It turns into a game between America and Russia, and the boy innocently releases a countdown to World War III.

programme.title: Enemy of the State
programme.desc: A congressman is assassinated and a videotape of the murder finds its way to the hands of Robert Clayton Dean, a labor lawyer who gets incriminated and enlists the help of an ex-intelligent agent to prove his innocence.

programme.title: Empire State
programme.desc: Based on true events, Chris Potatmitis settles for a security guard job at the Empire State Armored Truck Company after he disqualifies at the Police Academy. He mentions their faulty processes to his best friend, Eddie, and unexpectedly becomes part of an eleven million dollar heist. The police, and local crime bosses who are angered by their unapproved work in their turf, are now after them.

programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: When a mysterious monster attack devastates New York, a group of friends bands together to navigate the chaotic and dangerous streets of the city in an attempt to rescue one of their friends who has gotten trapped in her apartment.

programme.title: Furious Seven
programme.desc: Following Owen Shaw and his team, Dominic (Van Diesel), Brian (Paul Walker) and their team can return to the United States and lead a normal life again, but Owen's older brother is seeking revenge for his brother's death from Dominique. Thus, the entire gang is determined to take revenge on the man who killed their friend.

programme.title: World War Z
programme.desc: United Nations employee, Gerry Lane (Brad Pitt), must leave his family and traverse the world in a race against time to stop a Zombie pandemic that is crumbling armies and governments in its wake.

programme.title: Edge of Darkness
programme.desc: Detective Thomas Craven is investigating the murder of his activist daughter. He not only exposes sensitive aspects of her secret life, but also clashes with crime organizations that try to erase any thread that may link her to them.

programme.title: Rampart
programme.desc: A reckoning arrives for a police officer known for his ghastly ideals and hateful ways, as he is caught on tape brutally beating a guy. As his police department faces heat for letting him run amok, he struggles to tell friend from foe as he tries to defend his "right" to hate indiscriminately.

programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: When a mysterious monster attack devastates New York, a group of friends bands together to navigate the chaotic and dangerous streets of the city in an attempt to rescue one of their friends who has gotten trapped in her apartment.

programme.title: Furious Seven

Thus, the entire gang is determined to take revenge on the man who killed their friend.

programme.title: WarGames
programme.desc: A computer whiz kid accidentally connects into a top secret super-computer that allows him to control the US nuclear arsenal. It turns into a game between America and Russia, and the boy innocently releases a countdown to World War III.

programme.title: Big Momma's House
programme.desc: When a charming woman and her son are in danger of robbery, an FBI agent goes undercover as an overweight grandmother to help keep them safe by staying in the same house.

programme.title: Il paradiso delle signore

programme.desc: FBI agent Malcolm Turner once again dons the disguise of an overweight elderly woman as he goes undercover as a nanny to the children of the suspected designer of a computer worm that creates a backdoor to critical government intelligence files.

Rebecca has to figure out her way in life and try to overcome her addiction to shopping.

programme.title: In the House
programme.desc: The story of a high school teacher who gets drawn into a world of stories one of his students writes about the family of another student, often crossing the line to secret territories.

programme.desc: The film revolves around the history and politics of the reign of King Arthur, during the collapse of the Roman Empire, the outbreak of skirmishes over power in countries far from the empire, and the role of the Knights of the Round Table.

programme.title: Top Gun
programme.desc: The Naval Fighter Weapons School witnesses a fierce competition between two students, nicknamed Maverick and Iceman, as they try to win the school's top trophy.

programme.title: Chicago
programme.desc: (Roxie Hart ) and (Velma Kelly) each commit a murder; Roxie killed her boyfriend , and Velma killed her husband and sister. The two women grab the attention of the Chicago media,that love scandals. They both share the same lawyer (Billy Flynn) who tries to acquit them of their charges.

programme.title: The Theory of Everything
programme.desc: Inspired by his ex-wife's memoirs, events revolve around the stunning story of the life and achievements of the inspiring physicist Stephen Hawking, despite his motor neurone disease, with a special focus on his relationship with his ex-wife, Jane Wilde.

programme.title: Colors of Love
programme.desc: As Taylor Harris, a librarian who unexpectedly loses her job travels to her brother's tiny hamlet in Montana, she becomes embroiled in trying to stop businessman Joel Sheenan from renovating her brother's small-town hotel.

programme.title: Thirteen Days
programme.desc: As the Cold War is at its peak in October 1963, the American administration discovers that the Soviet Union has deployed nuclear missiles in Cuba, prompting US President Kennedy to intervene. As he leads a political struggle with his team to try to do what's necessary to deal with the imminent danger.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: A story about family, religion, hatred, oil and madness, focusing on the early days of oil exploration in the early twentieth century through Daniel Plainview, a businessman who takes a great opportunity that will change his life.

programme.title: King of California
programme.desc: When Charlie comes out of a mental institution because of his illness,he meets his teenage daughter Miranda. He tries to convince her that there is Spanish gold buried near by and they get closer while they search for it.

programme.title: Big Eyes
programme.desc: The film follows the huge success painter Margaret Keane had in the 1950s, and her heated divorce from her husband Walter Keane, who fraudulently claimed credit for her works.

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker
programme.desc: During its maiden voyage in the North Atlantic in 1961, Russia's first nuclear submarine malfunctions, and it's up to Captain Alexei Vostrikov and Officer Mikhail Polenin to save the ship and prevent a nuclear disaster.

programme.title: Birdman
programme.desc: Riggan Thomson is an actor with diminishing fame who once played an iconic superhero, he struggles to launch a Broadway play he wrote and wants to direct, while clashing with his family, his career and himself.

programme.title: Fargo
programme.desc: In Fargo, Minnesota, car salesman Jerry Lundegaard hires two men to kidnap his wife for a $ 1 million ransom paid by his wealthy father-in-law, but the plan gets complicated causing a series of heinous murders.

programme.title: Red Dragon
programme.desc: Retired FBI agent Will Graham is drawn back to his old life when he is recruited to help with the hunt of a serial killer known as the Tooth Fairy. To better understand the psychology of a killer, he reluctantly enlists the expertise of the infamous serial killer, Dr. Hannibal Lecter.

programme.title: Danny Collins
programme.desc: Aging rock star Danny Collins is still living on the edge at the age of 70, unable to organize his chaotic life. But when his manager discovers a recorded letter sent to him 40 years ago from John Lennon, Danny decides to amend his life and re-discover his purpose.

programme.title: Rain Man
programme.desc: When his father dies, Charlie is shocked when he discovers that he left his fortune to Charlie's autistic savant older brother whom he never knew about. Desperate to get his father's inheritance, Charlie kidnaps Raymond and takes him on a cross-country trip to convince him to give up his inheritance.

programme.title: Hell or High Water
programme.desc: A divorced father and his ex-con brother start a series of bank robberies to keep their family's ranch in West Texas, while two Texas Rangers try to catch them.

programme.title: Walk of Shame
programme.desc: After a hard day, a reporter tries to get out of her funk by going out drinking and having a one-night-stand. But the next morning, she finds that this night of fun may jeopardize her lifelong dream as she gets stranded with no way to go to the most important job interview of her life.

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: As Curtis tries to make it as a music manager, he provides a career change for a girls' band that consists of three soul singers. But as he tries to make the band into headliner material, he ends up demoting then firing the lead singer to replace her with another whom he deems more fit for stardom.

programme.title: Gold
programme.desc: Based on a true story, the movie revolves around Kenny Wells and Michael Acosta, two friends who set off on an adventure in the uncharted jungle of Indonesia in the hopes of finding gold.

programme.title: Lions for Lambs
programme.desc: Three parallel stories that take place in 90 minutes: an ambitious Republican Senator hopeful of presidential candidacy is conducting an hour-long television interview, while a university professor tries to motivate one of his students. At the same time, an army soldier is facing certain death in Afghanistan.

programme.title: Grace of Monaco
programme.desc: The biopic of Hollywood starlet Grace Kelly, who married Prince Rainier III of Monaco in April 1956. The film tracks a particularly trying time, during a political dispute in the 1960s between Rainier and French President Charles De Gaulle.

programme.title: Malcolm X
programme.desc: A biography of the African-American Muslim minister and human rights activist Malcolm X, who started his life as a gangster before converting to Islam and finally getting assassinated in 1965.

programme.title: The Count of Monte Cristo
programme.desc: Dantes is falsely accused by his best friend Fernand and is imprisoned in an island prison for 13 years. Dantes escapes and transforms himself into a rich count and dreams of only one thing: revenge.

programme.title: 25th Hour
programme.desc: After a drug dealer is convicted and cornered by the DEA in New York, (Montgomery Brogan) re-evaluates his life in the remaining 24 hours before facing a seven-year sentence.

programme.title: Pawn Sacrifice
programme.desc: During the Cold War era between the US and the former Soviet Union, the true story of the legendary American chess player Bobby Fischer (Toby Maguire), and the circumstances of his confrontation with his Russian counterpart Boris Spassky (Liev Schreiber) in a high level game of chess.

programme.title: Green Book
programme.desc: In 1962, Tony "Tony Lip” (Viggo Mortensen), an Italian-American tough bouncer, is hired to be the driver for the African-American classical pianist Dr. Don Shirley (Mahershala Ali) for a concert tour into the Deep South states. Because of America's racial segregation, Shirley relies on The Negro Motorist Green Book to guide them to small hotels, restaurants and gas stations. As the disparate pair witness and endure America's appalling injustices on the road, they find a newfound respect for each that opens their eyes to the world around them.

programme.title: Papillon
programme.desc: In the wake of a wrongful murder conviction, Henry is sent to a remote penitentiary colony. Once there, he soon comes to bond with another inmate, Louis Dega. Together, they plan for their escape.

programme.desc: When his family moves to a new house, Little Brother has trouble adjusting as he seems unable to make any friends. However, he seems more than satisfied with the relationships he does have. Until a mysterious disappearance disturbs his idyllic life.

programme.title: Mamma Mu och Kråkan
programme.desc: Mama Moo is an ordinary cow living a typical life, but she dreams to go on an adventure. When she meets Crow, she tries to get close to him, but he doesn't reciprocate the feeling.

programme.title: Primates of the Caribbean
programme.desc: Marco Macaco works as a beach officer and loves the beautiful Lulu, who's fascinated by Marco's rival, Carlo, who builds a gigantic monkey-shaped casino on Marco's beach. Marco discovers Carlo's evil plans and tries to stop him.

programme.title: Quest for a Heart
programme.desc: The mischievous Rolli befriends Milli, the beautiful elf girl and together they embark on an adventure to the Land of Winter to recover the mythical magical heart and save the Forest of Elves.

programme.desc: A small group of friends who call themselves The Wheelers, ride the streets on their skateboards to protect their neighborhood from crime, meet a friendly alien on the run and decide to help him.

programme.title: The Expendables
programme.desc: Barney Ross leads a team of skilled mercenaries to assassinate a merciless dictator of a small South American island, only to find themselves caught in a dangerous web of betrayal.

programme.title: The Rising Hawk
programme.desc: A small village in the Carpathian Mountains attempts to fight for freedom against the Mongols and their massive army as they search for new lands to conquer.

programme.title: Independence Day
programme.desc: Massive alien spacecrafts invade earth, causing chaos in communication systems around the world. A scientist discovers their plan to attack major points worldwide and invade earth. A fight for freedom begins between humans and aliens.

programme.title: The Hunger Games
programme.desc: In a dystopian post-apocalyptic future in the nation of Panem, Katniss Everdeen (Lawrence) volunteers to take her younger sister's place in the Hunger Games, where boys and girls between the ages of 12 and 18 are required to fight to death in a televised annual event until there is one remaining who will be crowned the victor.

programme.title: Atomic Blonde
programme.desc: On the eve of the fall of the Berlin wall, spy Lorraine Broughton goes on a mission to bring down the spy network that killed an undercover agent for an unknown reason.

programme.title: I, Robot
programme.desc: In the distant future, robots are created to help humans with their daily tasks. Detective Del Spooner begins to investigate the murder of a leading robotics scientist and discovers that a robot named Sonny is involved. He has to protect the fate of humans, and reconcile between them and the robots.

programme.title: The Hunger Games: Catching Fire
programme.desc: The repressed Panem is on the verge of rebellion as 74th Hunger Game victors Katniss and Peeta visit the districts on their victory tour. The two have become symbols of defiance against the Capitol, and for that they will be targeted by the despotic President Snow and his regime.

programme.title: The Expendables
programme.desc: Barney Ross leads a team of skilled mercenaries to assassinate a merciless dictator of a small South American island, only to find themselves caught in a dangerous web of betrayal.

programme.title: Savage Dog
programme.desc: Set in 1959 Indochina, where a group of Vietnamese and European war criminals rule over a labor camp, which is the worst prison in the land, a former boxer who is due for release vows revenge when the forces running the camp decide to keep him imprisoned.

programme.title: Transporter 2
programme.desc: Frank Martin is a former Special Forces operative who transfers goods for money. His latest job is to chauffer a politician's young son to and from school. When young Jack is kidnapped, Frank races to save the boy and foil the kidnapper's plot to release a deadly virus.

programme.title: Wild Oats
programme.desc: When a mistake leaves the retired Eva with a hefty sum of insurance money, she takes her best friend on a wild trip to the Canary Islands, all while fleeing the pursuing insurance investigator who wants her to give the money back.

programme.title: Slumdog Millionaire
programme.desc: (Jamal Malik) a poor youngster who grew up in Mumbai, becomes the contestant on the Indian version of (Who Wants To Be A Millionaire?). He is arrested for suspected cheating on the program. While he's interrogated ,the events show his difficult history that explains why he answers the questions.

programme.title: Home Alone
programme.desc: Accidentally left behind when his family goes on summer vacation, Kevin McCallister's newfound freedom is interrupted when a pair of burglars try to break into his house. It's up to Kevin to defend himself and his home with the aid of some boobytraps.

programme.title: Adaptation.
programme.desc: As screenwriter Charlie Kaufman struggles to write the screenplay adaptation of Susan Orlean's The Orchid Thief, his twin brother, Donald, moves in and disrupts his life.

programme.title: Gifted
programme.desc: When Frank takes in his niece Mary, he tries to give her a normal childhood away from the pressure that comes from being a mathematical genius like her mother. But Frank's mother stands in the way, drawing Frank into a legal battle over Mary's custody.

programme.title: Girl with a Pearl Earring
programme.desc: The story of the famous 17th century painting "Girl With a Pearl Earring". Griet (Scarlett Johansson) works as a maid in the home of painter Johannes Vermeer (Colin Firth). Vermeer agrees to paint Griet and she secretly pose for the painting while dealing with gossip in the secret servant world.

programme.title: Slumdog Millionaire
programme.desc: (Jamal Malik) a poor youngster who grew up in Mumbai, becomes the contestant on the Indian version of (Who Wants To Be A Millionaire?). He is arrested for suspected cheating on the program. While he's interrogated ,the events show his difficult history that explains why he answers the questions.

programme.title: Maladies
programme.desc: After mental illness causes James to retire from his acting career at a young age, his life with his sister and his best friend gets complicated as each tries to overcome personal maladies that make it harder for them to cohabitate or even live with themselves.

programme.title: Fathers & Daughters
programme.desc: A father struggles with mental and emotional breakdown while trying to raise his 5-year-old daughter as best as he can. The movie fast-forwards 30 years in time, with the daughter having become an adult and trying to overcome her issues and build connections of her own, despite childhood scars.
